-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
local UnityEngine = UnityEngine
System.namespace("ET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("PosHelper", function (namespace)
    local WorldToScreen
    WorldToScreen = function (position)
      return UnityEngine.Vector3(position.x, UnityEngine.Screen.getheight() - position.y, position.z)
    end
    return {
      WorldToScreen = WorldToScreen
    }
  end)
end)
